item.title: In this #HashiConf talk, @btkrausen from @Ahead shows how to use Consul's WAN gossip pool, prepared queries, and failover policies to ensure high availability for your apps in hybrid cloud & multi-cloud. https://hashi.co/2PTtcud
item.dc:creator: (@HashiCorp)
item.description: In this #HashiConf talk, @btkrausen from @Ahead shows how to use Consul's WAN gossip pool, prepared queries, and failover policies to ensure high availability for your apps in hybrid cloud & multi-cloud. https://hashi.co/2PTtcud

item.title: HashiCorp #Terraform Cloud and Enterprise can now integrate with #Azure DevOps Repositories, enabling users to store and version infrastructure as code configuration files in another version control system. Watch this demo video to learn more: https://hashi.co/2NjEKFy
item.dc:creator: (@HashiCorp)
item.description: HashiCorp #Terraform Cloud and Enterprise can now integrate with #Azure DevOps Repositories, enabling users to store and version infrastructure as code configuration files in another version control system. Watch this demo video to learn more: https://hashi.co/2NjEKFy
